attributes.action: introduce the Baccalaureate in place of G.C.S.E's at Secondary School.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The French Education System is a much better model than our current G.C.S.E's. As a young student I feel let down by England's Education System. It is very important that students study History, Politics and Geography until the end of compulsory education. A system similar or equal to that in France should be introduced!
